title: Necklace, 1987
signed: Incised on small clay disk at end of right cord: "Witt" above "87".
dimensions:
Dimensions, not including cords: 22h x 17.9w x 1.5d cm (8 11/16 x 7 1/16 x 9/16 in.)
Length of each cord: left: 26 cm. (10 1/4 in. ); right: 27 cm (10 6/8 in. )
creditline: Judith R. Tishman Collection, gift of Peter V. and Lynn P. Tishman
description: Small, flat collar woven and beaded, predominantly black and red; gold and black jade beads; central carved black jade pendant lays on top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Necklace, 1987.
1987. Nylon thread, black jade, gold. Judith R. Tishman Collection, gift of Peter V. and Lynn P. Tishman. 2002-16-5.
